CustomField.description: Forms a join relationship to the TerritoryID that this account is assigned to, which will in turn inherit the Territory that the TerritoryID is assigned to.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Forms a join relationship to the TerritoryID that this account is assigned to, which will in turn inherit the Territory that the TerritoryID is assigned to.
CustomField.label: Related TerritoryID
